keyMoments.title: Luffy Rings the Ox Bell 16 Times
keyMoments.description: The Ox Bell is rung sixteen times by Luffy at Marineford, creating a symbolic moment that echoes throughout the world.
keyMoments.significance: The bell becomes a symbol of transition between eras and serves as the centerpiece of Luffy's coded message to his crew.

description: A sacred ceremonial bell located in the central plaza of Marineford. Traditionally, it is rung eight times to thank the old year and eight times to welcome the new year during New Year celebrations. Ringing it sixteen consecutive times signals a momentous event - the end of one era and the beginning of another. The bell originally came from the famous battleship Ox Lloyd's.
